text: Volodymyr Riznyk (born 15 February 1966) is a retired Ukrainian football midfielder.Weltfussball ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:FC Polissya Zhytomyr players Category:NK Veres Rivne players Category:FC Karpaty Lviv players Category:FC Lviv (1992) players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Volodymyr Riznyk
